column1: Slides were incubated overnight at 4 degrees C with primary antibodies in PBS - TX with 1 - 3% BSA [ rabbit anti - pendrin, 1: 500 ( h766 - 780); rat anti - ZO - 1, 1: 100 ( Chemicon, Temecula, CA); goat anti - KCNQ1, 1: 200 ( C20, Santa Cruz Biotechnology, Santa Cruz, CA), rabbit anti - KCNE1, 1: 200 ( Alomone, Jerusalem, Israel); rabbit anti - KCNJ10, 1: 300 ( Alomone); rabbit anti - SLC12A2, 1: 100 ( Chemicon); and rabbit anti - connexin 26, 1: 100 ( Zymed, San Francisco, CA)].
